title: Spider-Man
tip: Shoots webs and swings through cities.
fact: Spider-Man was created by Stan Lee and Steve Ditko in 1962.

title: Iron Man
tip: Genius billionaire in a flying suit.
fact: Iron Man’s suit is powered by an arc reactor in his chest.

title: Captain Marvel
fact: She draws her power from the Tesseract’s energy.

title: Doctor Strange
fact: He guards Earth against magical threats.

title: Wonder Woman
fact: She was sculpted from clay and brought to life by Zeus.

title: The Flash
fact: He can time travel using the Speed Force.

title: Green Lantern
tip: Wields a ring powered by will.
fact: The ring creates anything the wearer imagines.

title: Black Panther
fact: His suit absorbs and redistributes energy.

title: Silver Surfer
tip: Cosmic hero with a shiny board.
fact: He once served Galactus as a herald.

title: Superman
tip: Flies, lifts cars, and shoots lasers from his eyes.
fact: He’s powered by Earth’s yellow sun.
